definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: It has been devising market-access rules that favour state firms.
sentences.chinese: 国家正在制定有利于国企的市场准入制度。

sentences.english: Export to the consultation of the national latest packing article market access standard in the destination.
sentences.chinese: 出口目的地国家最新包装物市场准入标准的咨询。

sentences.english: And demands for market access now flow both ways.
sentences.chinese: 而且，市场准入的要求现在变为双向的了。

sentences.english: The European Union needs to reduce barriers to market access.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲联盟必须减少市场准入方面的壁垒。

sentences.english: August "non-farm" to the market in Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 非农产品市场准入八一印度尼西亚。

sentences.english: Chapter four studies the market admittance and retreating system in electronic certification.
sentences.chinese: 第四章着重研究电子认证的市场准入和退出制度。

sentences.english: The students learn about writing market entry studies. The reports are written in English.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生在学习用英语撰写市场准入研究报告。

sentences.english: China also agreed to resume talks on beef market access.
sentences.chinese: 中国还同意恢复牛肉市场准入问题的会谈。

sentences.english: First, to break the state-ownership monopoly, loosen the restriction on market accession.
sentences.chinese: 首先，打破国有产权的垄断，放松市场准入的限制。

sentences.english: The implementation of market admission system for green food is an important project of WTO.
sentences.chinese: 实行绿色食品市场准入制是WTO的一项重要工程。

definition: to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
